content:
Rachel decides to continue the protest and risk arrest. She stands her ground and continues to raise her voice against the greed and corruption that has taken hold of the city.

The police officers move in and begin to arrest the protesters. Rachel is also arrested and taken to jail. While in jail, she has the option to wait for her release or to try and escape.

Do you:

1. Wait for release
2. Try to escape

Please select one of the above options by typing the corresponding number.
